channel.title: - MSN/YAHOO/AIM's Funniest Conversations! -
channel.description:
[i] Hi welcome to the funniest conversation's you have EVER had. If you got laughs off a conversation on a popular chat program then have the picture and post! Tonight we are all looking for something fun so I will start us off with a few funny pictures (on msn) You may also post your funny pictures from runescape. Do not post fake pictures.
Do not post anything for the following programs:
IRC's - We don't want those. Java based chat rooms. RPGs/MMOs - Do not post chats in games , runescape not included. C++ / XML - Do not post chats in these types of programs. Flash - Do not post chats that were in flash.
Best rated picture: Uriko's Worest rated picture: None
- How to rate - Just quote the post and say: Rating: 1-10 (depending on if it was funny)
The majority of 1 number will become that rating for the worest or the best.
My msn: Dickey_alex20@hotmail.com My display name: --Alex--
- Pictures -
only 3 for right now : - ( PLEASE READ IT: [img]http://img257.imageshack.us/img257/2646/msnuj5.png[/img]
[img]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/3646/convo14ec2.png[/img]
[img]http://img57.imageshack.us/img57/945/nooblg2.png[/img]
{ - F . A . Q - } Under construction DUH.

item.title: - MSN/YAHOO/AIM's Funniest Conversations! -
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:19, topic:80316”][quote author=nix link=topic=117930.msg1165486#msg1165486 date=1176699670]
a fresh one for you i just had

[Ben]-["Lil emo child"/"Goth Ninja"] says: seriousl stop wanking and read Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: LMFAO Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: im watching pk vids Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: xD [Ben]-["Lil emo child"/"Goth Ninja"] says: hhhmmmm yeah Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: i am lol [Ben]-["Lil emo child"/"Goth Ninja"] says: peekay vids.... sure 8-) Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: i getto i's 12th :P [Ben]-["Lil emo child"/"Goth Ninja"] says: peekay some asian pornstar? Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: .... Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: You never kno Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: he might [Ben]-["Lil emo child"/"Goth Ninja"] says: hmm [Ben]-["Lil emo child"/"Goth Ninja"] says: i find it disturbing you thaught of a male pornstar Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: o_O Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: he Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: as in Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: getto Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: might pk an asian pornstar Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: who plays rs Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: and not know it [Ben]-["Lil emo child"/"Goth Ninja"] says: she doesny know shes playing rs?? Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: no Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: that ghetto [Ben]-["Lil emo child"/"Goth Ninja"] says: what she doing? sucking off the mouse Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: mihgt not Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: no Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: now Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: know Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: that he killed an asian pornstar Adam ; Oh no, They broke out the cardboard, Looks like im heading for the dance floor! says: and i have horrible grammar
[/quote]

how is that funny?[/quote]

more random than funny i spose lol.

item.title: - MSN/YAHOO/AIM's Funniest Conversations! -
item.dc:creator: @Vahuka Vahuka
item.description:
@Vahuka wrote:

most retarded one i’ve had was me and my cousin saying pwned and adding another on the end, EG:
Alex:pwned
Me:pwned pwned
Alex:pwned pwned pwned
Me:pwned pwned pwned pwned

until we broke msn from saying pwned too much…

item.description:
@apzrman wrote:

“nose” convo (msn)

12/17/2006 10:08:42 PM Me: i was way off when i tried to find my nose 12/17/2006 10:09:04 PM Jayde: lol 12/17/2006 10:09:32 PM Jayde: well my friend touch her ear 12/17/2006 10:09:48 PM Me: i went even further then that 12/17/2006 10:10:46 PM Jayde: where did you go 12/17/2006 10:10:52 PM Me: alaska 12/17/2006 10:13:50 PM Jayde: ooooooooooo can i come to 12/17/2006 10:14:06 PM Me: sure, why not. we can all look for my nose! 12/17/2006 10:15:12 PM Jayde: yay

“blind” convo (msn)

[code]{][}J@§ON Vs¤®µ3£§{][} says: try an type with ur eyes closed
{][}J@§ON Vs¤®µ3£§{][} says: its very atd

{][}J@§ON Vs¤®µ3£§{][} says: i can get few letters

{][}J@§ON Vs¤®µ3£§{][} says: enything
{][}J@§ON Vs¤®µ3£§{][} says: like now i’ce for my wywa cloaws
{][}J@§ON Vs¤®µ3£§{][} says: (like now i’ve got my eyes closed)

Simon says: ok ill try

[i]
Hi welcome to the funniest conversation’s you have EVER had. If you got laughs off a conversation on a popular chat program then have the picture and post! Tonight we are all looking for something fun so I will start us off with a few funny pictures (on msn) You may also post your funny pictures from runescape. Do not post fake pictures.

Do not post anything for the following programs:

IRC’s - We don’t want those.
Java based chat rooms.
RPGs/MMOs - Do not post chats in games , runescape not included.
C++ / XML - Do not post chats in these types of programs.
Flash - Do not post chats that were in flash.
